resources.string: Note: Your version of Android is too old to use the file picker. You have to input the location of the file manually. The files will be saved to Download folder in the internal storage.
Birleştirmek/Ayrıştırmak için bölümlere ayrılmış APK'yı seçin.
Ask where to save the file each time (if disabled, save the merged APK to the same directory where the split file was from)
Storage permission needed to save to the same dir as the selected file
Couldn\'t find filepath of the selected file
Show dialog allowing selection of which splits to include
Automatically select splits for your device specifications
XAPK file detected, ensuring it can be extracted properly

ReVanced Manager produces an error when attempting to patch merged APKs. The error is not an actual problem and is produced incorrectly by a third party library. For most people, using the option to select splits for your device specifications will fix it. If it still doesn\'t work, the easiest thing to do is download a version of ReVanced Manager with the error removed.
